name: Rockstar Media Player
short_description:
ROCKSTAR MEDIA PLAYER - version 2.0
Copyright (C) 2015 ISYS lab


Rockstar Media Player is a very simple and light program for playing MP3, WMA, WMV and MP4 formats. The big button design is very easy and simple to use. It has a borderless design which looks similar to Windows Store application. Enjoy your movies and musics in the simplest manner.

*** Version 2.0 ***
== BUGS FIXED ==
* Minor bugs fixed

== FEATURES ADDED ==
* New Look

****** IMPORTANT ******
The icon(modified) used in Rockstar Media Player is a work of " Leonid Selivanov / bravebug ".
ARTIST LINK: http://openclipart.org/user-detail/bravebug
ICON LINK: http://openclipart.org/detail/162463/subwoofer-by-bravebug

The buttons used in Rockstar Media Player is a work of "deviantdark"
ARTIST LINK: http://deviantdark.deviantart.com/
ICON LINK: http://findicons.com/pack/1786/oxygen_refit
**************************
summary: The simplest media player on the web.
